leadership.name: Member, Alumni Leadership Committee
leadership.clubDescription: Alumni Leadership Committee - A group of dedicated alumni who oversee events and initiatives to engage and support the university's alumni community.
leadership.description: Oversee events and initiatives to engage and support alumni.

researchProjects.title: AI-Assisted User Story Generation
researchProjects.description: Research project exploring how AI can improve Agile development workflows
achievements: Evaluated LLMs (ChatGPT, Gemini, QWEN) for generating Agile user stories using structured metrics such as coherence, completeness, and relevance.
Developed a lightweight framework for integrating LLM outputs into real-world Agile workflows to improve clarity and delivery speed.
Simulated product integration and human-in-the-loop validation, emphasizing real-world usage and developer trust.

researchProjects.title: Enhancing Fake News Detection with Explainability
researchProjects.description: Machine learning research focused on making AI decisions more transparent and trustworthy
achievements: Added LIME-based explainability to a high-accuracy classification model for fake news detection, improving transparency for non-technical stakeholders.
Built interactive HTML visualizations of model decisions to simulate user-facing explainability tools.
Analyzed the system's robustness and generalizability to mimic production-ready ML pipelines.
